decision_conditions: The Release Payment of Â£196,540 shall have been received by the Council within 21 days from the date of this letter / decision. If payment has not been received within 21 days, the 1 Discounted Market Sale (DMS) unit shall revert back to being DMS units as per the original legal agreement.Reason - To comply with the terms of the Legal Agreement
